tips.text: Fuckin' excellent grub, aye.
De los sitios más auténticos que he visto aquí en Berlín. Parada obligatoria. :)
Great coffee just around the corner from Hackescher Market. The vegan pastries are sinfully good as well.
Tiny hidden coffee place in the Hackescher Höfe backyard. Incredibly nice owner, lovely little green tables outside.
Unbedingt die Törtchen probieren.
I fell in love with this place. Amazing staff, croissants that are out of this world. Great strudel and delicious sandwiches. The coffee was fantastic. Sadly it was too cold for their ice cream...
Der Barista weiß zwar wie man Bücher schön einpackt, aber nicht wie man einen Capuccino macht.
Great coffee with locally roasted Bonanza beans
Just like Taipei, except the whole €s thing
Himbeerlimo kann was.
Upload a SoundCloud recording of the mechanical organical vibe.
Hier dauert alles etwas lääääääängeeeeeeer! Aber gut, das Angebot ist ideal für jeden Veganer! ����
Great coffee and beautiful interior
The only place in Berlin you can enjoy greek cold coffee with bugatsa. Wish that Gregory's opens new shops in other European cities too.
Gercekten cok guzel bur yer ve Berlinin merkezinde. Kasarli tost ve cay esliginde harika vakit geciriyoruz. Tesekkurler...
Il miglior gelato artigianale di Berlino
Enjoy a casual breakfast at Barcomi’s (barcomis.de), a smart café that roasts its own coffee and serves filling, elegant breakfast plates and tasty bagels (around €8/ £7).
Cupcakes, coffee and juices! Cool! ;-)

Lovely little vietnamese coffee shop/eatery! They serve great specialty coffee from Bonanza and also traditional vietnamese coffee! Highly recommendable to try! Also you will find great little snacks!
Tolles kleines Café mit viel Liebe
Best teas in town
W-Lan primavera2010
Really really good coffee and breakfast!
The Salmon breakfast plate was very delicious. It's a nice café with a charming atmosphere.
Eine Oase der Ruhe!
Deutlich teurer für weniger Kuchen als in Kreuzberg + nur Tresen-Bestuhlung!
Please make your choice before occupying the counter. There are people who just want to get a quick coffee and go back to work ;)
The place is magic. Having a coffee under the cupola, listing to the echoes of the steps of the visitors, eating cake, is one the most lovely experiences you can have in the neighborhood.
Morroccon mint Tea
